meta.title: Estudos de Caso do eBPF
meta.description: Aprenda como o eBPF é usado em diferentes projetos.

Here are some of the organizations that: Aqui estão algumas das organizações que estão usando o eBPF em produção. Se você está usando o eBPF e não está nesta lista, por favor, <2>envie um pull request</2>.

items.title: Google
items.description: O Google usa o eBPF para auditoria de segurança, processamento de pacotes e monitoramento de desempenho.

items.title: Netflix
items.description: A Netflix usa o eBPF em escala para insights de rede.

items.title: Android
items.description: O Android usa o eBPF para monitorar o uso de rede, consumo de energia e perfil de memória.

items.title: S&P Global
items.description: A S&P Global usa o eBPF através do Cilium para redes em várias nuvens e localmente.

items.title: Shopify
items.description: O Shopify usa o eBPF através do Falco para detecção de intrusões.

items.title: Cloudflare
items.description: A Cloudflare utiliza o eBPF para segurança de rede, monitoramento de desempenho e observabilidade de rede.

items.title: Ikea
items.description: Ikea uses eBPF through Cilium for networking and load balancing in their private cloud.

items.title: Apple
items.description: Apple uses eBPF through Falco for kernel security monitoring.

items.title: Meta
items.description: Meta uses eBPF to process and load balance every packet coming into their data centers

items.title: Datadog
items.description: Datadog uses eBPF for networking and security in their SaaS product

items.title: Alibaba
items.description: Alibaba uses eBPF through Cilium to provide networking in their cloud

items.title: Red Hat
items.description: Red Hat uses eBPF at scale for load balancing and tracing in their private cloud

items.title: Isovalent
items.description: eBPF is the technlogy that powers Isovalent's enterpise networking, observability and security solutions

items.title: Seznam
items.description: Seznam uses eBPF for load balancing

items.title: Trip.com
items.description: Trip.com uses eBPF for load balancing

items.title: Bell
items.description: Bell Canada uses eBPF to moderize telco networking with SRv6

items.title: Wildlife Studios
items.description: Wildlife Studios uses eBPF through Cilium for high performance game networking

items.title: Capital One
items.description: Capital One uses eBPF to secure their cloud infrastructure

items.title: Sky
items.description: Sky uses eBPF through Cilium for cloud networking

items.title: Walmart
items.description: Walmart uses eBPF for edge cloud load balancing

items.title: Palantir
items.description: Palantir uses eBPF to debug networking problems

items.title: Cruise
items.description: Cruise uses eBPF to monitor GPU performance

items.title: Digital Ocean
items.description: Digital Ocean uses eBPF to monitor GPU performance

items.title: Yahoo
items.description: Yahoo uses eBPF for load balancing and performance analysis

items.title: Bytedance
items.description: Bytedance uses eBPF for system tracing

items.title: F5
items.description: F5 BIG-IP integration with Cilium VTEP feature

items.title: LinkedIn
items.description: LinkedIn uses eBPF for Infrastructure Observability

items.title: The New York Times
items.description: The New York Times uses eBPF for networking

items.title: SentinelOne
items.description: SentinelOne uses eBPF to detect and to respond to runtime threats like ransomware and zero-day exploits in real time.

items.title: Odigos
items.description: Odigos usa eBPF para instrumentar automaticamente qualquer aplicação, incluindo a propagação automática de contexto

items.title: Akita
items.description: Akita uses eBPF at scale for API observability.

items.title: groundcover
items.description: groundcover uses eBPF to instantly monitor application performance in cloud native environments, at any scale.

items.title: Core Tech
items.description: Core Tech uses eBPF to filter out unwanted traffic and mitigate DDoS attacks

items.title: FlowSecurity
items.description: Flow Security uses eBPF technology to analyze data in motion for data discovery, classification, risk management, and data violation detection and response

items.title: Helios
items.description: Helios uses eBPF in their runtime analysis tool for observability and security

items.title: ThreatX
items.description: ThreatX uses eBPF for securing their runtime environment and delivering real-time blocking for runtime threats

items.title: Levo
items.description: Levo uses eBPF for API discovery and documentation

items.title: Traceable
items.description: Traceable uses eBPF for enhanced data collection

items.title: Qpoint
items.description: Qpoint usa eBPF para monitorar e proteger o tráfego de saída para suas APIs de fornecedores externos

items.title: Protect AI
items.description: Protect AI utiliza eBPF para proteger aplicações LLM em produção em tempo de execução, fornecendo visibilidade para capacidades avançadas de detecção e resposta a ameaças

items.title: Akto
items.description: Akto usa eBPF para monitorar APIs e seu tráfego

items.title: Upwind Security
items.description: Upwind Security utiliza eBPF para oferecer segurança em nuvem profunda em tempo real/tempo de execução em grande escala.

items.title: Canopus
items.description: Canopus Networks developed “SuperNetflow,” a powerful observability pipeline that leverages eBPF to monitor and classify traffic at scale

items.title: Wikimedia
items.description: Wikimedia Foundation developed Liberica, a load balancer that supports multiple forwarding planes including Katran, Meta’s XDP-based load balancer built on eBPF

items.title: Rakuten Mobile
items.description: Rakuten Mobile uses eBPF for anomaly detection and security in cloud native telecom networks
